name: Prashant Nalini Vasudevan
content: Prashant Nalini Vasudevan Prashant Nalini Vasudevan I am an Assistant Professor in the Department of Computer Science at the National University of Singapore. I work in Theoretical Computer Science, usually on the theoretical foundations of Cryptography and its interactions with Complexity Theory. I am looking for postdoctoral researchers with experience in cryptography and related topics in theorerical CS to come work with me; see my Research page for details. Email prashvas at nus dot edu.sg Office COM3-02-23 More info CV DBLP Made using Jinja2, Skeleton, and way too much time
